title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard to create a nested class, the context is not set correctly.
EB: The new class wizard should set the context correctly for nested classes.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the new class wizard.
2. Choose to create a nested class.
3. Follow the steps to create the class.
4. Observe that the context is not set correctly.
